about-me.title: Über mich
about-me.text1: Hi, I am a fast-learning frontend developer based in Biedenkopf, Germany, with a passion for overcoming challenges and acquiring new skills. I thrive in dynamic environments where I can continuously improve and expand my expertise. My determination and adaptability make me a valuable asset to any team, always eager to take on new projects and push the boundaries of my knowledge.
about-me.text2: Bringing ideas to life is a passion of mine. Openness to advice comes naturally, as there's always something new to learn. Sharing my own experiences and advice is something I enjoy, helping to drive projects forward and achieve success. For me, collaboration and mutual support are the keys to successful and fulfilling projects.
about-me.text3: Drawing on my gained experience, I strive to improve my work continually. When it comes to my job, I am a perfectionist, ensuring every detail is just right. Once I start something, I tenaciously see it through to the end, as completing projects successfully and maintaining the highest quality is crucial to me.

my-skills.title: Meine Fähigkeiten
my-skills.description: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.

portfolio.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

projects.description1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Creat and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.description2: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and salsa bottles to fight against the chickenboss.
projects.description3: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokémon information.

contact.title: Contact
contact.question: Got a problem to solve?
contact.description: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing ideas and cotributing to your projects with my work.
contact.contact-me: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!
